s2.title: DOMCount
s2.p: DOMCount uses the provided DOM API to parse an XML file, constructs the DOM tree and walks through the tree counting the elements (using just one API call).

s3.title: Building on Windows
s3.p: Load the &XercesCInstallDir;-win32\samples\Projects\Win32\VC6\samples.dsw Microsoft Visual C++ workspace inside your MSVC IDE. Then build the project marked DOMCount.

s3.title: Building on UNIX
